name: Don't Restart!
description:
You are in the game! This game is really simple, just complete small puzzles to make it to the final level… If you complete the final level, you are done and you will be a hero! Just one small thing… do NOT restart! If you restart, weird things will happen and will bug the game!

This game was made by a team of 3 people called: “The Restarters”, _Adyn Calix_#5726, Justus#3399, Jeep (Observed)#1012.
Controls:
W - Move forward
A - Move left
S - Move backwards
D - Move right
Shift - Sprint
Spacebar - Jump
LeftMouseButton - Grab R - Reset the whole game
P - Stop the game to restart

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com/
